title: Account recovery

embed.description: If you have completed your Blue Essence conversion missions, check that you have redeemed the mission rewards. You can do this by going to the Loot section in your client (you can find this at the top of the client) Find any unopened Loot Capsules that you earned by completing the related Blue Essence conversion missions.

body:
So, I am trying to send a ticket for account recovery but I keep getting "The CAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again." error, tho there is no CAPTCHA at all.
Could I get some help on this please

EDIT:
Also maybe someone from community could help me out. I have issue with: Your account has been transferred to a different region. error once I try to log in on ANY server. (I'm very old school player, didn't play for very long time if I remember well)

replies.body: Hmmmm I've been hearing about the support site throwing errors for ticket creating off and on today. Try logging out and back in to see if that helps, but if not you can always shoot us a ticket by email support@riotgames.com. Our account agents should be able to review your account and figure out exactly what happened and set things right.
Yup, had to log out, sent ticket yesterday, guess I'll get help soon, cheers! :)
Now there is a captcha but "This page does not support your region."doesn't let me submit a ticket, nor does it forward me to a proper support link.
